hero.title: Build your ideal skincare routine
hero.description: It's time for your face skin to receive the care it deserves, learn the step by step with Selfthetik

exclusiveContent.title: What will you find in the exclusive content?

routine1.title: Build your first skincare routine
routine1.description: Easy, fast and effective. This will be the ideal routine for you if you are starting in the world of Skincare

routine2.title: Say goodbye to the discomfort of dry skin with this routine
routine2.description: Do you have dry skin? discover how to give it more shine and elasticity with just four steps.

routine3.title: Let's make excess oil no longer a problem
routine3.description: It's time to learn how to control that extra grease on our skin. Know this incredible routine.

benefit1.title: Know your skin and its care!
benefit1.description: We will help you to know the type of skin you have and you will learn how to assemble the ideal routine for you.

benefit2.title: Get an incredible shine!
benefit2.description: Your skin will look much healthier and brighter, it will look more hydrated and you will eliminate impurities.

benefit3.title: Your makeup will look a thousand times better!
benefit3.description: The secret to perfect makeup is the care you give your skin before using it, it will make it stand out and last longer.
